'''Andrew Higgins''' is a [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar. His PhD thesis, entitled 'The Genesis of Tolkien's Mythology', was supervised by Dr. [[Dimitra Fimi]]. He also teaches courses on Language Inventions and Tolkien, through Signum University/[[Mythgard Institute]].<ref>{{webcite|author=Vivien Stocker|articleurl=http://www.tolkiendil.com/tolkien/interview/fimi_et_higgins_en|articlename=Interview of Dimitra Fimi and Andrew Higgins|dated=April 2016|website=[http://www.tolkiendil.com/ Tolkiendil.com]|accessed=11 April 2016}}</ref>
